resources.string: Set screentime as the default launcher to access this option
请先启用General Accessibility无障碍功能
请先启用App Blocker无障碍服务
请先启用 View Blocke无障碍服务
请先启用Keyword Blocker 无障碍服务
请先启用Usage Tracker 无障碍服务
你的平均专注时长为 %2$d 分钟
Specify duration of focus mode in mins
允许查看 Instagram 收件箱发送的视频
Allow opening the first reel in feed
警告弹窗中可设置使用时长
Make sure not to forget this password. You may not be able to exit anti-uninstall without it.

Enabling this would unlock the following in screentime:
1. App Blocking
2, Focus Mode 

 screentime needs access to accessibility data to know when you open a specific feature within an app, like a social media feed or a game. This lets screentime block those features for you based on your preferences, helping you stay focused and reduce screen distractions.

 Rest assured, all accessibility data stays securely on your device—we never share or transmit your data, ensuring your privacy is always protected.

Enabling this would unlock the following in screentime:
1. View Blocking
2. Block Instagram reels,Tikok and Youtube shorts

 screentime needs access to accessibility data to know when you open a specific feature within an app, like a social media feed or a game. This lets screentime block those features for you based on your preferences, helping you stay focused and reduce screen distractions.

 Rest assured, all accessibility data stays securely on your device—we never share or transmit your data, ensuring your privacy is always protected.

THIS FEATURE REQUIRES DISPLAY OVER OTHER APPS (DRAW OVER OTHER APPS) PERMISSION TO WORK. PLEASE ENABLE IT FIRST AND THEN ENABLE THIS. RESTART IF SERVICE MALFUNCTIONS.


Enabling this would unlock the following in screentime:
1. Count number of reels/tiktoks scrolled
2. A floating overlay that shows time elapsed

 screentime needs access to accessibility data to know when you open a specific feature within an app, like a social media feed or a game. This lets screentime block those features for you based on your preferences, helping you stay focused and reduce screen distractions.

 Rest assured, all accessibility data stays securely on your device—we never share or transmit your data, ensuring your privacy is always protected.

Enabling this would unlock the following in screentime:
1. Block custom keywords
2. Block content like adult material

 screentime needs access to accessibility data to know when you open a specific feature within an app, like a social media feed or a game. This lets screentime block those features for you based on your preferences, helping you stay focused and reduce screen distractions.

 Rest assured, all accessibility data stays securely on your device—we never share or transmit your data, ensuring your privacy is always protected.

" Enabling this would unlock the following in screentime: 1. Anti-Uninstall (Setup required to run) screentime needs access to accessibility data to know when you open a specific feature within an app, like a social media feed or a game. This lets screentime block those features for you based on your preferences, helendping you stay focused and reduce screen distractions. Rest assured, all accessibility data stays securely on your device—we never share or transmit your data, ensuring your privacy is always protected. "
Please provide device admin permission to access this feature
End time must be after start time has passed!
%1$d 天后你才能关闭防卸载
You had an attention span of %1$.2f seconds/video
Failed to launch system digital wellbeing
等待 %1$d 秒 才能继续
screentime 使用“辅助功能”权限来提供应用监控和使用情况追踪等功能，以提升您的体验。此权限允许 screentime 检测应用活动并帮助有效管理设备使用情况。请放心，所有数据均在您的设备本地处理，绝不会发送到任何服务器或第三方。您的隐私和数据安全是我们的首要任务。点击“接受”即表示您确认并同意上述条款。
Perform actions like a back press
screentime 使用设备管理员权限来增强安全性，并在特定时间段内阻止卸载 screentime。所有数据都将安全地存储在您的设备上，绝不会与外部共享。
Prevent uninstallation attempts until a set condition is met
screentime 使用悬浮窗权限，在屏幕上显示一个小型叠加层。此叠加层会跟踪用户观看的短视频数量和使用时间。
计算每日平均短视频数量
Please provide display over other apps permission to access this feature
如果启用此功能，则在移除防卸载功能之前，您将无法更改配置，例如添加阻止应用、关键字等。更改将立即生效。
你确定要开启防卸载? There is no turning back...
此选项可以阻止 YouTube Shorts 和 Instagram Reels，同时允许访问其他应用功能。
